list.name: Default
list.comment: Allows selecting of citation style in citation modal

task.summary: Added Expand in local stae; Removed toggle
Moved onEdit to be local within Reference
Searches on title (only) including multiple (nonsequential) words
Searches on title (only) including multiple (nonsequential) words
Author now is displayed in collapsed view (though, it's ugly)
Added citeprocJS and added ability to generate citation for item
Cleaned up Editable code and style
Abstract now used textarea when editing
Added all text and number fields to expanded reference view
Fixed formatting of expanded view; added text to be used for tooltips
Allows editing of fields in EditReferenceScreen
Saves edited references back to state
Refactored so that name fields are within referenceFields
Removed open button (now opens using links)
Uses a (more) reliable id for new entries
Start of refactor. citation-js drops several fields
Changed storage format from bib to json/CSL
Check for duplicate ID on reference edit
Current version of citation-js isn't working for DOI
Fixed bug when no files specified
Started bottle API server implementation. Serves library from api
Allows selecting of citation style in citation modal
Added error handing on fetch; Moved citation-locale to server
